channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Update Train vs Bus COMPLETE 04/30/2024 INC#0749

item.description: Update COMPLETE Train vs Bus; INC#0749; 02:20PM; 901 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y787o1; #ExpositionPark; In close coordination with local hospitals, LAPD, MTA, and USC, firefighters and paramedics evaluated and treated at least 55 people as a result of the train/bus collision. Totals: 2 were transported in serious condition. 16 were transported in fair condition. At least 37 were treated and released on scene. No entrapment. No children or juveniles transported. Unknown occupations/affiliations of patients. Crews will be picking up and clearing the scene shortly.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AP4 AP43 AP65 BC13 CE59 CM20 CM22 E210 E215 E34 E46 EM1 EM5 HR3 PI2 RA15 RA266 RA46 RA66 RA813 RA814 RA815 RA826 RA846 RA865 RA894 SO1 T10 T15; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Train vs Bus; INC#0749; 01:10PM; 901 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y787o1; #ExpositionPark; Firefighters are on scene of a collision between a Metro Rail train and a USC Transportation bus, where at least 16 people were injured. Two from the bus (not trapped) were transported in moderate-to-serious condition (unknown total bus occupants at the time of the collision). At least fourteen additional patients from the train were evaluated on scene with minor injuries (total hospital transports will be updated at a later time). Media please stage near the intersection of Bill Robertson and Exposition Blvd. PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is on scene.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AP4 AP43 AP65 BC13 CM20 CM22 E210 E215 E34 E46 EM1 EM5 HR3 PI2 RA15 RA266 RA46 RA66 RA813 RA814 RA815 RA826 RA846 RA865 RA894 SO1 T10 T15; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Train vs Bus; INC#0749; 11:54AM; 901 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3y787o1; #ExpositionPark; Firefighters are on scene of a collision between a Metro Rail train and a bus (reported to have only the driver aboard). Multiple train passengers are reporting minor injuries. Crews are triaging all patients and organizing care and transport.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E210 E215 E34 E46 EM1 EM5 HR3 RA15 RA266 RA46 RA66 RA813 RA826 RA846 T10 T15; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0462; 09:31AM; 19800 W Marilla St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QkEqGj; #Chatsworth; Firefighters responded to a 2,932 square-foot two-story home built in 1958 with heavy fire inside. Crews advanced hose lines to the interior, while others ascended ladders to the roof to cut holes for the smoke and hot gasses to escape. It took 32 firefighters 20 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. One resident was home at the time, and sustained minor-to-moderate smoke inhalation while attempting to subdue the flames prior to LAFD arrival. Paramedics transported the approximately 55-year-old male to a local hospital. No firefighter injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC14 BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E70 RA107 RA70 SO1 T87 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0462; 09:11AM; 19800 W Marilla St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QkEqGj; #Chatsworth; PRELIM: Two-story home with fire showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC14 BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E70 RA107 RA70 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1871; 11:11PM; 7416 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvIay; #VermontKnolls; Firefighters responded to the vacant multi-family structure to find fire in one unit on the second floor. It took 34 firefighters 21 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E64 RA257 RA57 RA846 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1871; 10:50PM; 7416 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvIay; #VermontKnolls; One-story vacant multi-family residential building with fire in one unit. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E64 RA257 RA57 RA846 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1474; 06:21PM; 3725 N Stockbridge Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvUqk; #ElSereno; *Corrected Address* Firefighters responded to a two-story residential building (first-floor garage with second-floor living space) where a fire appeared to have started outside and spread into the attic and second floor. Firefighters advanced hose lines inside the structure and ascended ladders to provide vertical ventilation from the roof. Firefighters performed an interior search and found the abandoned structure to be vacant. It took 40 firefighters 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E2 E201 E212 E47 EM1 RA12 RA47 SO1 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1474; 06:03PM; 3725 N Stockbridge Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvUqk; #ElSereno; Two-story home (possibly vacant) with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E2 E201 E212 E47 EM1 RA12 RA47 SO1 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1257; 03:50PM; 6078 W Santa Monica Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JCCyFg; #Hollywood; Firefighters responded to a three-vehicle collisions that resulted in seven patients. One was transported in critical condition. The other 6 sustained only minor injuries. At least one of them was also transported to the hospital. Unknown age/gender. LAPD Inc # 3384.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E82 EM5 RA27 RA29 RA41 RA829 RA835 RA861 T27; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
